video_identification.title: Webinar: A Conversation With Sari Bashi

extracted_metadata.title: Webinar: A Conversation With Sari Bashi
extracted_metadata.description: Sari Bashi is an author, human rights lawyer and activist. She founded the NGO Gisha and is the author of a book, Maklooba (in English, Upside Down Love) and the blog Umm Forat. She is a Jewish Israeli woman living with her husband and children in the middle of Ramallah and discusses all this and more in this webinar.
